name: Dragon Rider Racing Match
description:
Dragon Rider Racing Match

Wants to ride in the monster trucks,download this game and go for the monster truck ride,dragon riders are waiting for you go with e the dragon rider and race wit them with your monster trucks,download this game and enjoy the HD Locations and different models of monster car and trucks.this game includes a lot's of different monster truck and car models.choose your favourite and go for the race.

Key Features

-> HD Locations of Hills

-> Number of monster trucks

-> Easy and effective controlling

-> User Friendly game
